name: hashbrown::raw::raw::RawTableInner::with_capacity
code: fn with_capacity<A>(alloc: &A, table_layout: TableLayout, capacity: usize) -> Self
// Avoid `Result::unwrap_or_else` because it bloats LLVM IR.
// SAFETY: All allocation errors will be caught inside `RawTableInner::new_uninitialized`.

conds.cond: Self::fallible_with_capacity(alloc, table_layout, capacity, Fallibility::Infallible) matches Err(_)
Self::fallible_with_capacity(alloc, table_layout, capacity, Fallibility::Infallible) matches Ok(table_inner)
